items.title: Sudan militia leader convicted of war crimes during Darfur war
items.description: Ali Kushayb led the Janjaweed, a group whose campaign of terror led to hundreds and thousands of deaths.

items.title: France in fresh political crisis as PM Lecornu quits after 26 days
items.description: Lecornu criticised the "partisan appetites" of political factions, who he said had refused to compromise.

items.title: US Supreme Court rejects Ghislaine Maxwell appeal in Epstein case
items.description: The British socialite is serving a 20-year prison sentence on sex -trafficking charges related to former boyfriend Jeffrey Epstein.

items.title: Eswatini accepts 10 US deportees despite legal challenge
items.description: This is the second group to arrive in the southern Africa state following a deal with the US government.

items.title: Asahi restarts beer production after cyber-attack
items.description: Japan's biggest brewer has restarted six factories that produce its popular Super Dry beer.
